tasks.task: Making and applying a natural pesticide
subtasks: Adding jalapeno peppers to water in a cup
Wearing gloves when handling hot peppers
Adding spices to the mixture (if desired, though not mentioned in the transcript)
Straining the mixture through cheese cloth into a container
Pouring the strained mixture into a spray bottle
Ensuring the spray bottle is sealed tightly
Wearing protective gear (mask and goggles) during application
Cautioning against windy conditions to avoid eye and inhalation issues
